name: TenaSpatPlugin-East
description: Plugin to publish SPat messages as a VUG::TrafficLight-v0.2.0 TENA SDO.

configuration.description: The value of the signalControllerIdentifier within the Scenario phaseSignalMappings attribute this adapter represents.
The endpoint for the TENA Execution Manager.
The number of milliseconds to spend handling callbacks each loop iteration.
The number of milliseconds to wait before attempting to contact the execution manager after an unsuccessful attempt.
The multicast Time-to-Live for best effort TENA data.
The multicast Time-to-Live for best effort TENA data.
